Package hu.racoonsoftware.filesystemchecker.service

Class FilesystemOperationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
hu.racoonsoftware.filesystemchecker.service.FilesystemOperationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FilesystemOperationService
@Service public class FilesystemOperationServiceImpl extends Object implements FilesystemOperationService
This class implementation of FilesystemOperationService. This implementation uses Database for store operation history entry and use own implementation of catalog algorithm in FilesystemHelper
